title: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests

communications.subject: Arizona Public Records Law Request: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

- All written requests for UAS deployment from January 1, 2023, through December 31, 2023.

- The flight logs from January 1, 2023, to December 31, 2023, for all unmanned aerial drones and vehicles used by the department.

Please see this link as an example of the format of records that I am requesting. https://www.muckrock.com/foi/carson-city-county-8863/carson-city-sheriff-drone-program-140470/#comms

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Ariel Van Cleve

title: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Flight logs for all unmanned aerial vehicles and drones used by your department from January 1, 2023, to December 31, 2023;

- All written requests for UAS deployment from January 1, 2023, to December 31, 2023.

Please regard this link as an example of the format of records I am further requesting. 
https://www.muckrock.com/foi/carson-city-county-8863/carson-city-sheriff-drone-program-140470/#comms

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ariel Van Cleve

title: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: 2023 UAV Flight Logs & UAS Deployment Requests
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- The flight logs from January 1, 2023, through December 31, 2023, for all unmanned aerial vehicles and drones flown by your department.

- All requests for UAS deployments from January 1, 2023, through December 31, 2023.

These types of records were released by your department in March 2023: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/carson-city-county-8863/carson-city-sheriff-drone-program-140470/#comms

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ariel Van Cleve

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

1) For records of all registration and registration renewals between public bodies and the Department of Aviation.

2)  An electronic (CSV preferred) copy of the data registry for all unmanned aircraft systems registered under subsection (2)(a) of law 837.360. 

3) Records of all annual reports of unmanned aircraft usage between state agencies and the Oregon Department of Aviation under (7)(a) of law 837.360. Please include documents from January 1st 2020 to January 1st 2023. 

Please refer to https://www.oregonlegislature.gov/bills_laws/ors/ors837.html.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Alessandro Guzman

title: Policies for Use of Force by Means of a Drone in Texas

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Each policy for use of force by means of a drone submitted to the Texas Commission on Law Enforcement between January 1st, 2022 to October 10, 2024, as described in Article 2.33, Code of Criminal Procedure, in 87 (R) HB 1758

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aaron Blum
